item.title: Ben Affleck is the next Batman
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
I wouldn’t mind a return to the Adam West style Batman, complete with BAMs and PIFs.

https://www.snotr.com/video/8155/Batman_-_Getting_rid_of_the_bomb

EDIT: Also, remember what a lot of people said about Heath Ledger being cast as the Joker.

EDIT 2 (Electric Boogaloo): Apparently, Bryan Cranston is rumored to be signing on to play Lex Luthor in the upcoming movie(s). And Matt Damon is possibly going to be Aquaman. Yeah.

Read full topic
